name: declei
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqbrtri(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2), cdc(nat0, c0))
stmt.pretty: eqbrtri(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2), cdc(0, c0))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cdc(nat0, c0))
-| wbr(cdc(nat0, c0), cle, cdc(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cdc(nat0, c0))
-| wbr(cdc(nat0, c0), cle, cdc(c1, c2))

|- wbr(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wbr(cdc(nat0, c0), cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)

body.origin:
|- wbr(cdc(nat0, c0), cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(nat0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)
-| wbr(nat0, clt, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(nat0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)
-| wbr(nat0, clt, c1)

|- wbr(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c1, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)
-| wbr(nat0, clt, c1)

|- wbr(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)
-| wbr(nat0, clt, c1)
-| wcel(c1, cn)

|- wbr(c0, cle, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)
-| wcel(c1, cn)

comment: Comparing a digit to a decimal integer. (Contributed by AV, 17-Aug-2021.)
